snippet: Doug Pederson is to become the new head coach of the Philadelphia Eagles, various media outlets reported on Thursday, with the appointment unable to be officially announced until the Kansas City Chiefs lose in the playoffs....
lead_paragraph: Doug Pederson is to become the new head coach of the Philadelphia Eagles, various media outlets reported on Thursday, with the appointment unable to be officially announced until the Kansas City Chiefs lose in the playoffs.

headline.main: Eagles Line Up Pederson as New Head Coach: Reports
headline.print_headline: Eagles Line Up Pederson as New Head Coach: Reports
